value:
To think a world such as this could
exist... If I stayed here, then
perhaps...

Circumstances being what they are, I
shall lend you my strength. However,
just one shall ever be my true master.

To surpass General Gawain...is my
ultimate goal as a swordsman.

I share a sword style with Ike, of the
Greil Mercenaries... We also shared
a master.

I learned the sword from a man I once
called master. And now, that man...$k$pNo... I have nothing to share.

Are you $Nu?
Accept this missive from
$Nf.

To surpass my master... That is
my true desire.

My master's blade was stronger...
It was swifter...
Use my blade as you see fit.

I am a general of Daein, and one of
the Four Riders.

I learned the sword from one of my
fellow Four Riders, Gawain. He was a
general without compare...$k$pI fought my master, and I won.
However, by then he had already
cast aside his true skill.$k$pThis means I have not truly
surpassed him.$k$pBut defeating one whose strength
rivaled his own could be another
means of achieving that goal.$k$pI have forever longed for such a
battle.$k$pNot everyone would understand such
drive, but as one who also lives by
battle, I thought that perhaps you...$k$pWell, that is all.
ふんっ！
...Move.
うああっ！
You're...good...
Know your place.
Will you survive?
Fool.
Give your all.
Can't move...
Hmph...
Curious as to who I am? You're better off not knowing, or perhaps even asking.
Your method for wresting my attention is...perplexing.
This armor I wear is blessed by the goddess.
Pray that you never make a miscalculation.
Know your strength to know when to exercise discretion.
The son of Gawain... Ike... He, now, is my prey.
I am here to protect you.
Understood.
Onward.
Here I go.
